sentences.sentence: He can be quite standoffish and rude, even to his friends.
sentences.translation: 他有时会很冷淡，很粗鲁，甚至对自己的朋友也是如此。

sentences.sentence: I imagine God to be rather formal, almost standoffish.
sentences.translation: 在我想像中，神是拘谨的，近乎冷漠的。

sentences.sentence: Alice is a little standoffish when it comes to socializing.
sentences.translation: 艾丽斯一到社交场合就(显得)有些冷漠。
